page.title: 06SHROVE TUESDAY, SCARBOROUGH
page.content: On{Shrove Tuesday}we have pancakes for dinner and after we shall go to the {beach}and skip.Skipping on this day is an old traditon for {Scarborough}people.Some stupid people like teenagers can get other teenagers and throw them into the freezing cold water with all their clothes on. After we had enough of skipping we would go and get a huge stick of candy floss and then we would go on the amusements. Me and my Aunty Rachel nearly got thrown in the sea, but Dad got the older lads with a skipping rope. The road by the sea is closed off on {Shrove Tuesday}so the skipping can take place safely. Some people skip on the beach, but we skip on the road. We have a realy good day and then go to my Nanna's for some more pancakes!
